data.comment: The match is underway in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
The match is underway in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Throw-in Valencia.
Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Valencia's area.
Free kick Alaves.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
Alaves have a dangerous throw-in.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Valencia at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Alaves a goal kick.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Valencia's Dani Parejo misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Valencia have an attacking throw-in.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
Denis Cheryshev gets his shot on target but fails to score for Valencia.
Edgar Mendez (Alaves) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
Alaves's Joselu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Carlos Soler of Valencia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Alaves have a goal kick.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Valencia.
Valencia take a 0-1 lead thanks to Dani Parejo.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Valencia.
Geoffrey Kondogbia (Valencia) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for Valencia at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Lucas Perez for Alaves has been booked by Jesus Gil Manzano and receives a first yellow card.
Alaves's Joselu goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Valencia.
At Estadio de Mendizorroza, Ximo Navarro has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Valencia push upfield but Jesus Gil Manzano quickly pulls them for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Valencia close to the penalty box.
Alaves's Rodrigo Ely has been booked in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Valencia attack but Daniel Wass's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Valencia throw-in in Alaves's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Valencia in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Jesus Gil Manzano will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Valencia's area.
Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
Throw-in for Valencia at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Alaves.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Important block from the Valencia defence as Joselu fires in a strike for Alaves.
Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Valencia are coming forward and Alessandro Florenzi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Alaves a goal kick.
Can Alaves capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jose Luis Gaya (Valencia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Joselu is booked for the home team.
Alaves push forward at Estadio de Mendizorroza and Luis Rioja gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Valencia defence.
The match at Estadio de Mendizorroza has been interrupted briefly for a check on Luis Rioja, who is down injured.
Goal kick for Valencia at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Alaves’s Luis Rioja is on his feet again at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Throw-in for Valencia at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Francis Coquelin is replacing Alessandro Florenzi for Valencia at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Borja Sainz (Alaves) has replaced the possibly injured Luis Rioja.
Alaves's Victor Camarasa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Valencia defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Throw-in Valencia.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Valencia advance rapidly upfield but Jesus Gil Manzano blows for offside.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Alaves just outside Valencia's area.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team have replaced Kevin Gameiro with Goncalo Guedes. This is the second substitution made today by Albert Celades.
Edgar Mendez gets an equalizer for Alaves. The score is now 1-1.
Victor Laguardia instrumental with a fine assist.
At Estadio de Mendizorroza, Valencia are penalized for being offside.
Alaves drive upfield and Joselu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Valencia defender.
Alaves to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
Alaves make their second substitution with Pere Pons replacing Victor Camarasa.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Goncalo Guedes.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Goncalo Guedes returns to the field for Valencia after picking up a slight injury.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Vitoria-Gasteiz to check on Ljubomir Fejsa, who is grimacing with pain.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
Asier Garitano (Alaves) has taken off Ljubomir Fejsa who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Manu Garcia is the replacement.
Albert Celades (Valencia) is making a third substitution, with Rodrigo Moreno replacing Denis Cheryshev.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Alaves.
Edgar Mendez (Alaves) has received a first yellow card.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz, Alaves push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Valencia close to the penalty box.
Alaves pushes forward through Joselu, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Valencia.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Free kick Alaves.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
That's full-time at Estadio de Mendizorroza. The final score is 1-1.
Mouctar Diakhaby (Valencia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
